name: Cloud Dispersion
description:
A game in which you have to distribute a cloud, separating it, with the main objective of irrigating an entire orchard before the water in the cloud runs out.🌧️

🎮 Controls:

- Hold left click to move cloud

- Double left click to separate the cloud

🔗 Link to iluio.io:  https://liluo.io/alangrios/cloud-dispersion 🎧 Listen Soundtrack:  https://on.soundcloud.com/d2Vcw ✏️Creator's note: 

 Making this game was a real madness, I'm definitely tired but very satisfied with the results, the hardest part was making the music in just 6 hours; Not to mention a whole last minute graphics update because I didn't like the old ones. I hope you enjoy it and that it is a fun experience for you. -Alangrios

I want to send a special thanks to the GDevelop team, for organizing this great Jam with this theme full of possibilities.

PS: I know that the excuses are not valid, but the letters are always out of balance when exporting :(
